title: Dr. Todd Graham Pain Management Improvement Act of 2018
content: Dr. Todd Graham Pain Management Improvement Act of 2018 This bill requires the Centers for Medicare amp. Medicaid Services to publish a report on whether Medicare payments, coverage, and coding policies for non-opioid pain management treatments should be revised. The report must include an analysis of pain management and prescribing guidelines, access to non-opioid treatments, and the effect of any recommended changes on Medicare and enrollee opioid addiction.
